title: Diane's carrot and coriander soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 medium onion, chopped', '5 medium carrots, chopped', '1 medium potato, peeled and chopped', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh coriander', '900ml boiling water', '2 vegetable cubes', 'salt and pepper to taste']
